name: Silver King Inn & Suites

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had a great stay at the Silver King Inn & Suites, looks NEW after the renovation. Breakfast was GREAT! Room was clean and staff was friendly. Best place to stay in Leadville.
reviews.title: Great Place for enjoying the mountains

likes.liked: — Great Location with views of the highest mountains in Colorado!

reviews.title: Silver King was great
reviews.text: Great View of the mountains from the hotel, yo can see Turquoise Lake from the parking lot too.

reviews.title: Opening Day Ski Cooper, Great Snow
reviews.text: We were there in high season so the rate was $115 but well worth it! I have stayed in several hotels in Leadville and can say this one is cleaner and better appointed than most.

reviews.title: A great inexpensive family place.
reviews.text: Hope to go back for ski season and enjoy the Tenth Mountain Hut System.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Quite modern, and well located for the area attractions. Leadville in summer is a nice little town, with some interesting history and some pleasant family style bars and shops.
reviews.title: A mixed experience

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This motel could get really good reviews with a bit more effort from the management. Rooms are spacious and well equipped: good beds, coffee maker, nice bathroom. Facing away from the road, they are quiet at night. There's a sizeable breakfast room and guest lounge attached with some games provided and a PC.
reviews.title: Don't expect too much

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: However, the wifi doesn't reach the annex that we were in, so one has to go to the lobby (and at 9-50pm I was told the lobby would close at 10pm). The sign outside advertises their restaurant, which the desk clerk confided had closed at least 3 years ago. Worst of all, the guest laundry facility has handwritten out-of-order signs (but the machines show signs of having been inoperable for a long time) and the front desk advised me to use the public laundry down the road at the same cost - which was nonsense, and also inconvenient.
reviews.title: Clean, well maintained, great breakfast

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Breakfast is excellent, and one of the best free services I've encountered. Waffle makers, fresh fruit, 3 juices, quality cereals still in their boxes, boiled eggs, bread, toast... top class.
reviews.title: FABULOUS!
Top-notch quality, comfort, value & personal service at the top of the world!
reviews.text: So overall, it's a mixture, Solve the wifi and the laundry, and I'd give a higher score.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We concur with all the good reviews for this local motel. We liked the layout of the clean room, the fact that everything worked from top to bottom, and the excellent continental breakfast. The owners are enthusiastic, energetic and friendly. Perfect place to stay if you are on a motorcycle, as you can park right outside your room. The Silver King is located on the edge of town, so to "do" Leadville, you'll probably need to drive.
reviews.title: Great local lodging

likes.liked: — The friendly owners, the continental breakfast, the clean room.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We went to Leadville and stayed at the Silver King Inn - It was great! The staff was so friendly, made us feel so welcome....Especially David and Donna who were very informative on the area and gave great ideas on adventures to take while visiting...The free breakfast was EXCELLENT! Great selection!
reviews.title: The BEST place to stay in Leadville!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The rooms, comfortable and the scenery, breathtaking. So glad we stayed here and look forward to going back again.
reviews.title: Spring in the Mountains, its Cooler!

reviews.text: I would recommend it to everyone!
reviews.title: Room OK, Breakfast Buffet Good

likes.liked: — no extra pillows or blankets, bedspread old, front desk friendliness poor

reviews.text: Leadville is a great place to see the mountains. From the parking lot of the Silver King Inn & Suites you can see more 14,000 foot high mountains than most people see in a lifetime! Snow capped in the spring and early summer it is alot cooler than in Denver here all year long.
reviews.title: Would definitely stay here again!

likes.liked: — Clean, modern hotel at a good rate
likes.disliked: — The climate control didn't work; could have used a refrigerator

description: Located at the top of the Rockies!
